Hello,

EMAIL_CREATED_ACCOUNT_TEXT: Hi {{userName}}, You have been registered in {{applicationName}}. You can access to your account logging here with your email. Your temporary password is {{password}} . We recomend change your password in your Profile Best regards, {{applicationName}}
